segments.text: Yes , I ’ m doing some research on Roman civilization . Do you have any books on the subject ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: These books over here are about ancient history . They might be helpful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I check this one out ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sorry . It ’ s for reference only , so it must stay in the library . But you ’ re welcome to look through it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . And I ’ d like to check these books out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . They ’ re due back next Wednesday .
segments.speaker: S1
